content:
I'm giving a presentation tomorrow on current status of IPA.

@Ricky Bloomfield I remember in DevDays Amsterdam you mentioned some figures of providers integrated with Apple Health in the US. Any chance to get an updated figure? A ballpark one?

Hi, here's the list: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT208647

There are currently 582 institutions listed there. We also recently went live with a few institutions in the UK and Canada: https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2020/10/health-records-on-iphone-available-today-in-the-uk-and-canada/
